title: PO .NET configuration
description: Configuration file schema for the PO .NET VS Code extension (podotnetconfig.json).

sourceDirs.description: List of directories containing .cs source files (relative to the configuration file). Subdirectories are included.

poDirs.description: List of directories containing .po files (relative to the configuration file). Subdirectories are included.

localizeFuncs.description: Names of localization functions to recognize in source code.
